entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 10:31 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: W 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
